nodes.text: Outpost Salara was a settlement on the planet Tatooine during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. It was located in a canyon connecting Jundland Wastes and Dune Sea.

Outpost Salara was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. It appears as one of the Republic settlements on the planet Tatooine.
